text: YOU GUYS, Harry Styles from One Direction just played his debut solo single'Sign Of The Times'on BBC Radio 1 during a 2 - hour interview with Nick Grimshaw - AND IT'S SO GOOD. Since One Direction went on hiatus last summer, Harry Styles has been a busy little bee - after landing a role in Christopher Nolan's Dunkirk and going to Jamaica to record his debut solo album. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Today, he released the first single'Sign Of The Times '. So, you wan na hear it? HERE IT IS : Yeah, we're obsessed. Harry also spoke to Nick for two hours ( TWO HOURS ) about everything from what Adele gave him for his birthday to his'weird'and
